title: Live Updates: Israel Expands Evacuation Warnings in Southern Lebanon
content: The Israeli military told residents of more than 20 towns and villages to leave, a sign that its invasion could be expanding. The death toll in an Israeli strike near central Beirut rose to nine, Lebanese officials said.
summary: The Israeli military told residents of more than 20 towns and villages to leave, a sign that its invasion could be expanding. The death toll in an Israeli strike near central Beirut rose to nine, Lebanese officials said.

title: After Successes, Israel’s Military Is in a ‘Long Game’ With No Clear Outcome
content: A year after perhaps the worst military and intelligence debacle in the country’s history, its armed forces have regained the momentum. Some ask: to what end?
summary: A year after perhaps the worst military and intelligence debacle in the country’s history, its armed forces have regained the momentum. Some ask: to what end?

title: Amid Sanctions, Russian Oil Tankers Are Flying New Flags

title: S. Iswaran, Ex-Singapore Minister, Sentenced to 1 Year in Prison
content: The sentence for S. Iswaran, a former transportation minister who pleaded guilty last week, was longer than what prosecutors had sought.

title: U.K. to Return Chagos Islands to Mauritius, Ending Colonial-Era Dispute
content: After years of legal wrangling and negotiations, Britain said it would surrender sovereignty of the archipelago in the Indian Ocean.
summary: After years of legal wrangling and negotiations, Britain said it would surrender sovereignty of the archipelago in the Indian Ocean.

title: After Iran’s Missile Attack, Israel May Be Ready to Risk All-Out War

title: Israel’s Strikes in Beirut Brings the Once-Bustling Suburbs to a Standstill

title: A Survivor of Clerical Sex Abuse Tells His Story at the Vatican
content: As a child, Laurence Gien was abused by a priest in South Africa. Decades later, he became the first survivor to recount his pain at the Basilica in front of Pope Francis and dozens of cardinals and bishops.

title: Dozens of Migrants Die Off Djibouti After Smugglers Force Them to Swim

title: ‘There’s No Safety’: Decision to Leave Ends in Tragedy for Lebanese Family
